definition:
type Device {
    Id: ID!
    Timestamp: String!
    DeviceModel: String
    DeviceTypeInt: Int
    IsExpired: Boolean
    DeviceVendor: String
    OsTypeInt: Int
    IsTestDevice: Boolean
    PartnerBrandId: String
    HardwareIdMd5: String
    HashedMdn: String
    AtlasUniqueUserId: String
    CreatedAt: String
    InstallationSource: String
    SalesSource: String
    RegistrationCountry: String
    RegistrationCity: String
    RegistrationRegion: String
    IsPosCustomer: Boolean
    SolutionHubProductInstanceId: String
    UserDefinedProductTypeText: String
    SolutionHubUserId: String
    ProductSubType: String
    ReceiptId: String
    Retailer: String
    OrderNumber: String
    UtcOffset: DeviceUtcOffset @http(url: "http://host.docker.internal/account/home1devicestate/table/DeviceUtcOffset/:Id")
}

type DeviceUtcOffse {
    PartitionKey: ID!
    TimeZoneName: String
    ValueInMilliseconds: Int
}

type Query {
    deviceByDeviceId(deviceId: ID!): Device
        @http(url: "http://host.docker.internal/account/home1devicestate/table/Devices/:deviceId")
}
